alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hastings, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dupont Center and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
